DOC.brief_summary: The Patient Response Graded Sensory Stimulation-Pilot Study ( PRoGReSS-PS ) measure back pain perception participant receive either chiropractic treatment foot massage . The study also measure back pain function research questionnaires measure .
DOC.brief_title: PRoGReSS-PS : Patient Response GRraded Sensory Stimulation : A Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: The Patient Response Graded Sensory Stimulation Pilot Study ( PRoGReSS-PS ) measure back pain perception participant receive either chiropractic treatment foot massage . In study , researcher : 1 . Measure participant 's back pain function use research form . 2 . Test participant 's ability discern different touch sensation low back . 3 . Assess participant 's perception study procedure research form study short interview end study .
DOC.criteria: Age 2165 Years Low Back Pain ( LBP ) meeting Quebec Task Force ( QTF ) Classifications 16 Minimum LBP pain level 11point NRS ( Worst pain past 24 hour ) LBP classify chronic ( onset 12 week previous ) Written Informed Consent No plan move area next 68 week Transportation come clinic regular basis LBP meeting QTF Classifications 711 Bone joint pathology contraindicate spinal manipulation include : joint instability ; recent spinal rib fracture , nonunion ; severe osteoporosis ; spinal paraspinal tumor ; aortic aneurysm > 5 cm ; cauda equina syndrome Retention legal advice relate previous LBP episode participant active occupational personal injury case Inability read verbally comprehend English Legally blind even aid glass and/or contact lens Evidence alcohol drug dependence abuse per selfreport determine history examination Depression score > 29 ( severe ) Beck Depression InventoryII Unwillingness postpone use type manual treatment LBP except provide study duration study period Comorbidity require coincident clinical management , prevent delivery care , interfere ability ass participant health status and/or treatment outcomes Comorbidity require referral serious potentially serious health concern Inflammatory disease spine ( e.g . Ankylosing spondylitis , Rheumatoid arthritis ) Uncontrolled hypertension Unable safely tolerate study procedure Need additional diagnostic procedure xray urinalysis Pregnancy seek become pregnant active study phase Seeking receive compensation disability Unable unwilling comply study protocol Extremity condition prevent safe massage ( e.g. , injury , infection ) Minimum pain level eligibility appointment Recent tattoo pierce lumbar region ( within past 6 month ) Peripheral neuropathy extremity due safety concern Amputation extremity Bleeding disorder due safety concern Currently take opioid medication due impact pain perception Unable identify least 3 5 letter draw dominant hand baseline examination due somatosensory outcome measure ( graphesthesia ) Fracture back , hip rib past 8 week History spinal surgery spinal injection low back
